info.author: Thomas J. Duck
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
info.description:
PyGTS is a python package that can be used to construct, 
manipulate, and perform computations on 3D triangulated surfaces.  
It is a hand-crafted and "pythonic" binding for the GNU Triangulated 
Surface (GTS) Library.
info.license: GNU Library General Public License (LGPL) version 2 or higher
info.name: pygts
info.summary: PyGTS creates, manipulates and analyzes triangulated surfaces
info.html_description: PyGTS is a python package that can be used to construct, manipulate, and perform computations on 3D triangulated surfaces. It is a hand-crafted and “pythonic” binding for the GNU Triangulated Surface (GTS) Library.
